column4: Can anyone explain how to use either of these apps: http://www.mail-archive.com/gnu-emacs-sources@gnu.org/msg00685.html or http://www.kde-apps.org/content/show.php/Snippits?content=52197
Can anyone explain how to use this utility? http://www.kde-apps.org/content/show.php/Snippits?content=52197
Does anyone know of a text expander utility for Linux like Texter in Windows or Textpander in Mac?
